name: Face Recognition Attendance System
desc: A robust system designed to authenticate individuals and record attendance using facial recognition technology powered by deep learning.

name: CyberCipher
desc: web-based encryption and decryption tool that provides a user-friendly interface for various cryptographic methods. This project aims to offer a platform for exploring and utilizing different encryption techniques for both text and files.

name: Hotel Reservation System
desc: This project implements a comprehensive hotel booking system with separate customer and admin login functionalities.

name: ClassTrack
desc: class attendance system designed to streamline attendance management.

name: Breadth First Search
desc: Breadth-First Search (BFS) algorithm to find the shortest path in a graph

name: Philvolcs 2024 Visualization
desc: This dataset is about earthquake events in year 2024
